Load the discography of K3:

```{r}
df <- K3Reviews::get_reviews()
```

Show the first entries:

```{r}
knitr::kable(head(df))
```

How many reviews?

```{r}
n_reviews <- nrow(df)
```

There are `r n_reviews` reviews.
